Question: Hosin Global Electronics Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hosin Global Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: HG2319 40nm USB Interface Storage Control Chip

- World’s first 40nm USB interface storage control chip
- Utilizes USB3.0 technology for flash memory storage speed innovation
- High speed, stable, and reliable flash memory storage
- Suitable for desktop and notebook computers
- Committed to providing high-quality and innovative storage products and solutions
- Focus on integrated circuit design and storage product application
- Headquartered in Shenzhen, with a focus on R&D, production, testing, and sales of memory chip products
- Committed to developing a localized supply chain and cooperating with domestic DRAM manufacturers
- Adaptable to the development of 5G, Internet of Things, and other emerging technologies
- One-stop solution to circuit design and storage product application problems
Summary_cn:
何信环球电子有限公司

产品: HG2319 40纳米USB接口存储控制芯片

- 全球首款40纳米USB接口存储控制芯片
- 使用USB3.0技术进行闪存存储速度创新
- 高速、稳定、可靠的闪存存储
- 适用于台式机和笔记本电脑
- 致力于提供高质量和创新的存储产品和解决方案
- 专注于集成电路设计和存储产品应用
- 总部位于深圳，专注于存储芯片产品的研发、生产、测试和销售
- 致力于发展本地化供应链，与国内DRAM厂商合作
- 适应5G、物联网和其他新兴技术的发展
- 一站式解决电路设计和存储产品应用问题
